entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
